title: JavaScript Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript, including variables, functions, loops, and DOM manipulation. Perfect for beginners looking to start web development.

title: Advanced CSS Techniques
description: Take your CSS skills to the next level with flexbox, grid layouts, animations, and best practices for responsive design.

title: Full-Stack Development
description: Master full-stack web development with a hands-on approach, covering frontend (React), backend (Node.js, Express), and databases (MongoDB).

title: React for Beginners
description: A beginner-friendly guide to building modern web applications using React, including components, state management, and hooks.

title: Node.js and Express
description: Learn how to create backend applications using Node.js and Express, including routing, middleware, and RESTful APIs.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Dive into data science with Python! Covering NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and machine learning basics with Scikit-Learn.

title: UX/UI Design Principles
description: Learn the fundamental principles of UX/UI design, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing for creating intuitive digital experiences.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Understand the core concepts of cybersecurity, including network security, encryption, and ethical hacking techniques.

title: Machine Learning with Python
description: Explore supervised and unsupervised machine learning techniques using Python, including deep learning with TensorFlow.

title: SQL for Data Analysis
description: Learn SQL fundamentals to extract, manipulate, and analyze data efficiently from relational databases.

title: Django Web Development
description: Build dynamic and scalable web applications with Django, covering models, views, templates, and authentication.
